mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.user_name , t1.sex , t1.birthday_date , t1.phone_number , t1.id_card , t1.certificate_valide , t1.house_address , t1.contact_address , t1.theporary_permit , t1.contact_address_phone , t1.start_living_time , t1.in_city_year , t1.support_number , t1.marital_status , t1.education , t1.credit_card_amount , t1.house_property , t1.unit_name , t1.belong_department , t1.post_name , t1.company_phone , t1.company_address , t1.company_nature , t1.month_salary , t1.other_income , t1.position_level , t1.in_company_year , t1.is_private_owner , t1.spouse_name , t1.spouse_phone , t1.spouse_education , t1.spouse_id_card , t1.spouse_certificate_valid , t1.spouse_living_address , t1.spouse_unit_name , t1.spouse_company_phone , t1.spouse_company_address , t1.spouse_company_nature , t1.spouse_month_salary , t1.spouse_other_income , t1.spouse_position_level , t1.spouse_in_company_year , t1.spouse_is_private_owner , t1.create_time , t1.update_time from car_loan_user t1 where t1.ORDER_NUMBER = #{dto.orderNumber}

select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.user_name , t1.sex , t1.birthday_date , t1.phone_number , t1.id_card , t1.certificate_valide , t1.house_address , t1.contact_address , t1.theporary_permit , t1.contact_address_phone , t1.start_living_time , t1.in_city_year , t1.support_number , t1.marital_status , t1.education , t1.credit_card_amount , t1.house_property , t1.unit_name , t1.belong_department , t1.post_name , t1.company_phone , t1.company_address , t1.company_nature , t1.month_salary , t1.other_income , t1.position_level , t1.in_company_year , t1.is_private_owner , t1.spouse_name , t1.spouse_phone , t1.spouse_education , t1.spouse_id_card , t1.spouse_certificate_valid , t1.spouse_living_address , t1.spouse_unit_name , t1.spouse_company_phone , t1.spouse_company_address , t1.spouse_company_nature , t1.spouse_month_salary , t1.spouse_other_income , t1.spouse_position_level , t1.spouse_in_company_year , t1.spouse_is_private_owner , t1.create_time , t1.update_time from car_loan_user t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.user_name , t1.sex , t1.birthday_date , t1.phone_number , t1.id_card , t1.certificate_valide , t1.house_address , t1.contact_address , t1.theporary_permit , t1.contact_address_phone , t1.start_living_time , t1.in_city_year , t1.support_number , t1.marital_status , t1.education , t1.credit_card_amount , t1.house_property , t1.unit_name , t1.belong_department , t1.post_name , t1.company_phone , t1.company_address , t1.company_nature , t1.month_salary , t1.other_income , t1.position_level , t1.in_company_year , t1.is_private_owner , t1.spouse_name , t1.spouse_phone , t1.spouse_education , t1.spouse_id_card , t1.spouse_certificate_valid , t1.spouse_living_address , t1.spouse_unit_name , t1.spouse_company_phone , t1.spouse_company_address , t1.spouse_company_nature , t1.spouse_month_salary , t1.spouse_other_income , t1.spouse_position_level , t1.spouse_in_company_year , t1.spouse_is_private_owner , t1.create_time , t1.update_time from car_loan_user t1 where t1.order_number = #{orderNum} limit 1
mapper.update: update car_loan_user t1 set t1.id =#{dto.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.order_number =#{dto.orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.user_name =#{dto.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.sex =#{dto.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.birthday_date =#{dto.birthdayDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.phone_number =#{dto.phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.id_card =#{dto.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.certificate_valide ='1', t1.house_address =#{dto.houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.contact_address =#{dto.contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.theporary_permit =#{dto.companyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.company_address =#{dto.companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.company_nature =#{dto.companyNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.month_salary t1.update_time =#{dto.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from car_loan_user where id in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update car_loan_user t1 set t1.valid='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
